title: FS: 1909-11 Cobb Red Portrait SGC 60- SOLD SOLD!
author: MBMiller25

posts.post_title: FS: 1909-11 Cobb Red Portrait SGC 60- SOLD SOLD!
posts.post_content:
I am selling it for good this time, as my time in this hobby has come to an end.  In addition to this, if your looking for any high end Musial and Clemente cards, Let me know.  I am asking $2075 for this card which includes insured express shipping.  Let me know if you have any questions by emaling me at [url]MBMiller25@yahoo.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i525.photobucket.com/albums/cc338/mbmiller25/B8JFQ2kKGrHqJgwEy18K0z-BBM21IQ0_3.jpg[/IMG]
Gorgeous card!  Sorry you are leaving the hobby.:(
If you need A back scan, please feel free to let me know.  This card is really nice.
